description: Complete MCP tool registry for go-invoice with all 21 tools across 5 categories

invoice_management.description: Tools for creating, updating, and managing invoices

tools.name: invoice_create
tools.description: Create a new invoice for a client with optional work items. Supports flexible client identification and automatic client creation when needed.

client_name.description: Name of the client to create invoice for

client_email.description: Email address for client identification (alternative to client_name)

invoice_date.description: Invoice date in YYYY-MM-DD format (defaults to today)

due_date.description: Payment due date in YYYY-MM-DD format (defaults to 30 days from invoice date)

create_client_if_missing.description: Create new client if not found (requires new_client_* fields)

new_client_phone.description: Phone number for new client creation

work_items.description: Optional work items to add to the invoice

examples.description: Create a simple invoice for an existing client
examples.expected_output: Invoice created successfully with auto-generated number and default due date
examples.use_case: Basic invoice creation for regular clients

tools.name: invoice_list
tools.description: List and filter invoices with flexible search criteria. Supports filtering by status, client, date ranges, and provides multiple output formats.

client_name.description: Filter by client name (partial matches supported)

limit.description: Maximum number of invoices to return

examples.description: List all unpaid invoices with summary statistics
examples.expected_output: List of sent invoices sorted by due date with total unpaid amounts
examples.use_case: Collections management and overdue invoice tracking

tools.name: invoice_show
tools.description: Display comprehensive details for a specific invoice including client information, work items, and financial breakdown.

invoice_id.description: Invoice ID to display (alternative to invoice_number)

examples.description: Show complete invoice details in readable format
examples.expected_output: Formatted display with client info, all work items, totals, and timestamps
examples.use_case: Invoice review and client communication preparation

tools.name: invoice_update
tools.description: Update invoice details such as status, due date, or description. Validates business rules and prevents invalid status transitions.

invoice_id.description: Invoice ID to update (alternative to invoice_number)

due_date.description: New due date in YYYY-MM-DD format

examples.description: Mark invoice as sent after delivery to client
examples.expected_output: Invoice status updated to 'sent' with timestamp recorded
examples.use_case: Invoice delivery workflow and status tracking

tools.name: invoice_delete
tools.description: Delete invoices with safety confirmations and business rule validation. Supports both soft delete (default) and permanent removal.

invoice_id.description: Invoice ID to delete (alternative to invoice_number)

hard_delete.description: Permanently delete invoice data (default is soft delete)

force.description: Skip confirmation prompts (use with extreme caution)

examples.expected_output: Invoice marked as deleted but data preserved for audit trail
examples.use_case: Removing incorrect or duplicate draft invoices safely

tools.name: invoice_add_item
tools.description: Add work items to existing invoices with automatic total calculation. Supports single or batch work item entry for draft invoices.

invoice_number.description: Invoice number to add items to

invoice_id.description: Invoice ID to add items to (alternative to invoice_number)

work_items.description: Work items to add to the invoice

examples.description: Add single work item to invoice
examples.expected_output: Work item added to invoice with totals automatically recalculated
examples.use_case: Adding newly completed work to existing invoices

tools.name: invoice_remove_item
tools.description: Remove work items from invoices using flexible identification methods. Supports removal by ID, description match, or date with automatic total recalculation.

invoice_number.description: Invoice number to remove items from

invoice_id.description: Invoice ID to remove items from (alternative to invoice_number)

work_item_id.description: Specific work item ID to remove

work_item_description.description: Remove items matching this description (partial match)

work_item_date.description: Remove items from this specific date

remove_all_matching.description: Remove all items matching criteria (not just first match)

examples.description: Remove specific work item by ID
examples.expected_output: Specific work item removed with totals recalculated
examples.use_case: Removing incorrectly added or duplicate work items

client_management.description: Tools for managing client information and contacts

tools.name: client_create
tools.description: Create a new client with contact information and business details. Supports comprehensive client data entry with validation.

tools.name: client_list
tools.description: List and filter clients with flexible search criteria. Supports filtering by name, email, active status, and provides multiple output formats.

tools.name: client_show
tools.description: Display comprehensive client details including contact information, invoice history, and relationship statistics.

tools.name: client_update
tools.description: Update client information including contact details, business information, and status. Maintains audit trail of changes.

tools.name: client_delete
tools.description: Delete clients with dependency checking and safety confirmations. Supports both soft delete and permanent removal.

data_import.description: Tools for importing timesheet and client data from external sources

tools.name: import_csv
tools.description: Import timesheet data from CSV files with flexible column mapping and validation. Supports batch import of work items and client creation.

tools.name: import_validate
tools.description: Validate import data before processing to identify potential issues and data quality problems. Provides detailed validation reports.

tools.name: import_preview
tools.description: Preview import results without making changes to the database. Shows what would be imported with detailed change summary.

data_export.description: Tools for generating and exporting invoice documents and reports

tools.name: generate_html
tools.description: Generate professional HTML invoices with customizable templates and branding. Supports multiple design themes and client-specific formatting.

tools.name: generate_summary
tools.description: Generate comprehensive business reports and summaries including revenue analysis, client statistics, and time tracking reports.

tools.name: export_data
tools.description: Export invoice and client data in various formats (CSV, JSON, Excel) for accounting systems and external integrations.

configuration.description: Tools for system configuration and validation

tools.name: config_show
tools.description: Display current system configuration including database settings, file paths, and business rules. Shows all configuration sources and their priorities.

tools.name: config_validate
tools.description: Validate system configuration for completeness and correctness. Checks database connectivity, file permissions, and business rule consistency.

tools.name: config_init
tools.description: Initialize system configuration with interactive setup wizard. Creates configuration files, sets up database, and configures business rules.

getting_started: Use 'config_show' to check current system configuration
Use 'config_validate' to ensure system is properly set up
Use 'client_create' to add clients before creating invoices
Use 'invoice_create' to create new invoices for clients
Use 'invoice_list' to view and filter existing invoices
best_practices: Always validate configuration before starting work
Use preview and validation tools before making data changes
Use soft delete (default) instead of hard delete for data safety
Include work items during invoice creation for efficiency

claude_desktop.setup: Add this tools.json to your Claude Desktop MCP configuration
claude_desktop.recommended_context: This tool set provides comprehensive invoice management capabilities including client management, timesheet import, invoice generation, and reporting.
